ygData.subject: Getting worried, close to deadline
ygData.msgSnippet: My brother still hasn t gotten off his credit card payments, and the deadlin draws even nearer. I now have less than a month to get back on my character,
ygData.messageBody:
My brother still hasn't gotten off his credit card payments, and the
deadlin draws even nearer. I now have less than a month to get back
on my character, rehabilitate, and explain to my wife what has been
going on. Seems to me I'll have to do a major patch-up on a EQ
relationship, and have to make up some major levels. If the deadline
isn't reached, I'll have to restart my 24 Iksar Shaman, who has lots
of good stuff (about 150p in total) and start from scratch again. It
might take awhile to explain it to my wife, but whatever works,
works, right?
-Zakassis Thunderling
